data.eml:eml: Synemon ignita sp. nov., a new sun moth species from southern Australia (Lepidoptera, Castniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kallies, Axel, Edwards, Ted, Young, Andy, Douglas, Fabian (2016): Synemon ignita sp. nov., a new sun moth species from southern Australia (Lepidoptera, Castniidae). Zootaxa 4092 (3): 436-444, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4092.3.10
